content.rendered:
Objective O is a program that aims to strengthen the achievement of 2030 agenda on sustainable development and enhancing multi-stakeholders (Governments, NGOs, farmers, Scientifics, community, youth and children, women, Indigenous Peoples and their communities, business and industry, workers and trade unions) participation and involvement in achieving the Sustainable Development Goals by reducing ignorance on the 2030 Agenda. Through the production of videos contents from the field, ANYL4PSD intends to improve people understanding on sustainable development goals and their challenges; increase countries engagement towards sustainable Development Goals; and voice out for improved policies and the living conditions of affected populations’ especially vulnerable/minority people (women, youth, children, and indigenous people).  

[huge_it_portfolio id=”2″]

Through the production of videos contents from the field, ANYL4PSD intends to improve people understanding on sustainable development […]
